title: Cookies, Cream, and Crumbling Cores
summary: Perseverance’s drives over the last few weeks have doubled back several times. Why such an unconventional route? Team scientists have been delighted to find new kinds of rocks that could be the oldest ever found on Mars and are eager to collect samples. Perseverance embarked on the Crater Rim Campaign in search of ancient uplifted […]

title: Live coverage: SpaceX Falcon 9 launch to feature first landing attempt in The Bahamas
summary: The Falcon 9 first stage booster, tail number B1080, will target a landing near Exuma, an island within The Bahamas. Liftoff from pad 40 at Cape Canaveral Space Force Station is set for 6 p.m. EST (2300 UTC).
